title: #ICYMI - Tiger vs Phil – 18 Holes, $9 Mil
description:
In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel… Tiger Woods. Phil Mickelson. 18 Holes. 9 million dollars. Hosts Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly sit down with neuroscientist Heather Berlin and sports physicist John Eric Goff to breakdown the science, both physical and mental, behind this epic match-up of two golfing titans.

Photo Credit: DIRECTV.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
